description.en-us: Anthracite Debut series AcceleRacers: Silencerz Produced 2005 â€“ 2016 Designer Nathan Proch Number G8125\n\nAnthracite is an original design by Nathan Proch that first debuted under the Silencerz segment of the AcceleRacers series in 2005 . It depicts a technologically advanced liquid metal vehicle with 853 HP, an 8 liter beryllium straight 8 engine, clamshell thermoformed impact resistant poly-carbon body, and a steel frame.
